channel.title: made on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in made on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-12
item.description: Locket, an app for sharing photos to friends’ homescreens, hits the top of the App Store (5 minute read) Locket is an app that turns Apple’s widget system into a private social networking platform.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-09
item.description: Kombucha was just the beginning. This designer wants to create a bacteria-based food industry (2 minute read) Plurality Now is a conceptual restaurant that offers a menu of food derived from bacterial cultures.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-26
item.description: How Riot used tech from The Mandalorian to build Worlds’ astonishing mixed reality stage (4 minute read) As the pandemic goes on, events such as the annual League of Legends World Championship have to find creative ways to bring the show to the audience.
